text: "Dirty Work" is a 1972 song by Steely Dan. It is the second track from their debut studio album Can't Buy a Thrill. It was included on their greatest hits albums Citizen Steely Dan (1993), Showbiz Kids: The Steely Dan Story, 1972–1980 (2000) and Steely Dan: The Definitive Collection (2006) ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:Steely Dan songs Category:José Feliciano songs Category:Melissa Manchester songs Category:The Pointer Sisters songs Category:Kenny Rogers songs Category:Pop songs
title: Dirty Work (Steely Dan song)
